item.title: Veritas NetBackup OpsCenter
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.veritas.com/support/en_US/article.100052100 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Veritas has published updated versions of Log4j that replace the vulnerable libraries used by NetBackup OpsCenter 8.1.2 through 9.1.0.1. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 14:51:29 NCSC-NL Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Veritas NetBackup Primary Server BYO (also known as Master Server)
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.veritas.com/content/support/en_US/article.100052058 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Veritas strongly recommends customers upgrade to NetBackup 8.1.2 or the latest release in order to be able to perform the mitigation steps. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 14:51:29 NCSC-NL Updated community link source.
